ygData.subject: Gnoll Hide Lariet - Secret nerf?
ygData.msgSnippet: I got my first one a couple weeks ago and my second one last night.  I used it at first just to try it out and I liked the speed.  I saw the you don t have
ygData.messageBody:
I got my first one a couple weeks ago and my second one last night. I used
it at first just to try it out and I liked the speed. I saw the "you don't
have the will" message frequently (I am only 21, it procs at 25). Well, I
put it back in to the bank for a while. The other day I brought it back
out in place of my tentacle whip because it is a difference of 2 or 3 in
weight and I was on a fairly strict weight limit. As I used it over the
next couple hours I didn't see a single "will" message. I dual weiled the
GHL last night for about 20 minutes and still didn't see any messages. The
other day I heard the Mistwalker's procs were nerfed to %25 of what it was.
Does anyone know if the GHL has been nerfed also? I enjoy the speed of
them, but if they are nerfed they become rather usless with a base of 3 damage.
